last_episode_to_air.name: Swinging Both Ways
last_episode_to_air.overview: What does it take to sell sex to same-sex partners when you're straight yourself? A cammer and porn star reveal all.

name: The Sex Business
overview: Documentary series exploring three aspects of the sex industry in the UK - porn, escorts working from their own homes and prostitutes working on the streets. Not for the faint-hearted.

episodes.name: Porn Stars
episodes.overview: A disparate group of porn stars reveal how a world of fantasy and surface glamour masks the costs paid by these performers in their personal lives.

episodes.name: Working From Home
episodes.overview: Three independent escorts - so-called 'Sleazy Michael', dominatrix Mistress Dita and selfie-obsessed Holly - pride themselves on being the ones in control.

episodes.name: Working the Streets
episodes.overview: The final episode follows six women who sell their bodies on the streets of Britain, each of whom have suffered sexual and mental abuse, and consequently manage serious addictions.

episodes.name: Pain For Pleasure
episodes.overview: As the series exploring the world of sex workers returns, this edition enters the secretive world of those that pay to be dominated and the women who dominate them.

episodes.name: Pleasure On Demand
episodes.overview: Documentary series exploring how people buy, sell and market sex. A cast of colourful characters explode the myths and misconceptions about those who sell their bodies.

episodes.name: Orgasms On Sale
episodes.overview: This edition of the documentary series explores the hidden world of women who are paying for sex.

episodes.name: Me and My Sex Doll
episodes.overview: Sex doll aficionados and retailers reveal why they believe 5,000 pound sex dolls with artificial intelligence are set to revolutionise the nation's sex lives.

episodes.name: OAPs on the Game
episodes.overview: The hidden world of those who sell sex to top up their pensions or challenge societal expectations, when most people their age are planning their funerals.

episodes.name: Teens Selling Sex
episodes.overview: Young sex workers reveal why they decided to stop giving it away for free to make a living as escorts, cammers and entrepreneurs.

episodes.name: Spank Me Harder
episodes.overview: With access to the hidden world of female submissives, four sex workers reveal how they make a living.

episodes.name: The World's Biggest Strip Joint
episodes.overview: At the most famous strip club in the world, it is not uncommon for them to earn in excess of $100,000 per annum and rub shoulders with superstars.

episodes.name: Swinging Both Ways
episodes.overview: What does it take to sell sex to same-sex partners when you're straight yourself? A cammer and porn star reveal all.
